lines: 3m medical materials and technologies helps health care manufacturers design and build more reliable, innovative and feature-rich medical devices
material and / or technology for health care or medical device construction
the product is designed for use in diagnostic medical devices such as test strip, lab-on-a-chip and pcr applications.

3m microfluidic diagnostic tape 9793r, consists of a clear polypropylene film coated on one side with a pressure sensitive acrylate adhesive.the tape is supplied on a white silicone coated paper release liner
can be used in 'lab-on-a-chip' diagnostic consumable constructions
may be integrated with additional 3m technologies and medical materials for finished device innovations
3m microfluidic diagnostic tape 9793r, single sided clear polyolefintape, configurable
microplate seals for pcr, elisa, and other bioanalytical applications.

customers leverage 3m technical expertise to select materials and technologies that integrate together for their break-through medical industry, device innovations designed for improving or enhancing lives.
